name: Memory Way
description:
Atmospheric 3D-platformer about  human's way in the world of his memories, regrets and hopes.

Find your way through the ends of your memories...

Team:
Akimov Nikolay  — Programming, Game Design
Gavrilenko Alexander — 3D-Art, Level Design
Alina Osadchuk — 2D-Art
Vasilisa Maksimenko — Concept Art, Content Manager
Support:
Alexander Kiselev — Voice-over
